sentences.sContent: She tried to run, but was hampered by her heavy suitcase.
sentences.sCn: 她想跑，但沉重的旅行箱拖累了她。

sentences.sContent: An attempt to rescue the men has been hampered by bad weather.
sentences.sCn: 对那几名男子的营救行动受到恶劣天气的阻碍。

remMethod.val: 你都妨碍 (hamper) 到他了， 他怎么能高兴 (happy)？

trans.tranOther: to make it difficult for someone to do something
